subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: There’s a fine crop of up-and-coming players in the league, but it may take several of them to move the sport forward, rather than one such as the Yankees’ Derek Jeter, who stood alone.
snippet: There’s a fine crop of up-and-coming players in the league, but it may take several of them to move the sport forward, rather than one such as the Yankees’ Derek Jeter, who stood alone.
